table.name: vtiger_mailchimp
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_mailchimp` ( `mailchimpid` int(11) NOT NULL, `mailchimpname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `campaign_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `campaign_type` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `campaign_status` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `lastsynchronization` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mailchimpid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_mailchimp` FOREIGN KEY (`mailchimpid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_crmentity` (`crmid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_mailchimpcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_mailchimpcf` ( `mailchimpid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mailchimpid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_mailchimpcf` FOREIGN KEY (`mailchimpid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_mailchimp` (`mailchimpid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mailchimpsyncdiff
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_mailchimpsyncdiff` ( `crmid` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `relcrmid` int(11) NOT NULL, `relmodule` varchar(100) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mailchimp_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_mailchimp_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `apikey` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `listid` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `newsubscribertype` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `lastsyncdate` varchar(25) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-01 09:30:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
